title: Introduction to Web APIs
content: Web APIs allow applications to communicate over the web using HTTP requests and responses.
questions: How do APIs facilitate communication between applications?

title: REST APIs
content: REST APIs use HTTP methods like GET, POST, PUT, DELETE to manage resources.

title: JSON and Data Formats
content: JSON is a lightweight data format commonly used for API responses.
questions: Why is JSON preferred over XML?

title: Authentication & Security
content: APIs often require authentication using tokens or API keys to secure data access.
